maqras.text: 75|1|buhwal-ui nal-eul dugo naega maengsekeondae
75|2|geuligo magsimhi huhoehaneun yeonghon-eul dugo naega maengsekeondae
75|3|ingan-eun naega geuui ppyeoleul mo-euji anh-eul geos-ilago saeng-gaghaneunga
75|4|geuleohji anhnola. naneun geuui songalag-eul hanalo mandeul-eobeolil su issnola
75|5|geuleona ingan-eun apjangseoseo saagham-eul jeojileugil wonhadeola
75|6|geuga mul-euni "buhwal-ui nal-eun eonjelan mal-inga
75|7|sigag-i neogs-eul ilhgo
75|8|dal-i bich-eul ilh-eumyeo
75|9|haewa dal-i gyeobchyeojil ttae
75|10|ingan-eun geunal malhal geos-ila : "domangchil gos-eun eodiinga
75|11|geuleohji anhnola. pisincheolan eobsnola
75|12|geunal-eun geudaeui junim-i jeongchagjila
75|13|ingan-eun geunal jagiga naenoh-eun geosgwa neujchun geos-eul tongbo bad-eul geos-ila
75|14|sillo ingan-eun hwagsilhan jeung-geoga jagi jasin-eul deopchil geos-ila
75|15|geuga jagi byeonmyeong-eul neul-eonohdeolado geuleohal geos-ila
75|16|geudaeneun geugeos(kkulan)eul iyulo geudaeui hyeoleul geubhi umjig-yeo seoduleuji malla
75|17|sillo geugeos(kkulan)ui bojongwa nangsong-eun naui chaeg-im-ila
75|18|geuleoni naega geugeos(kkulan)eul ilg-eumyeon geu nangsong-eul ttaleula
75|19|geu hu geugeos(kkulan)ui seolmyeong-eun naui chaeg-im-ila
75|20|gyeolko geuleohji anhnola! geudaedeul-eun hyeonseleul salanghamyeonseo
75|21|naeseneun naebeolyeodudeola
75|22|geunal pogeunhan eolguldeul-i iss-euni
75|23|geudeul-ui junim-eul balabol geos-ila
75|24|geunal jjing-geulin eolguldeul-i iss-euni
75|25|jasindeul-ege jaeang-i deopchil geos-ila hwagsinhadeola
75|26|geuleohji anhnola. geugeos(yeonghon)i bisjangppyeoe dodalhaess-eul ttae
75|27|geuligo salamdeul-i "jumun-eul oewojul janeun nugu-inga?" lago malhal ttae
75|28|geuligo geuga geugeos-i sabyeol(sabyeol)ila hwagsinhal ttae
75|29|goeloum-i goeloumgwa majdah-eul ttae
75|30|geunal mollyeo gal gos-eun geudae junim-ila
75|31|geulihayeo geuneun midji anh-assgo yebaeleul deulijido anh-ass-euni
75|32|ohilyeo geuneun bu-inhamyeo dol-aseossnola
75|33|geu hu geuneun yangbangeol-eum-eul geol-eumyeo jagi gajog-egelo naagassnola
75|34|geudaeege jaeang-i gakkawossdoda. tto gakkawossdoda
75|35|dasi hanbeon, geudaeege jaeang-i gakkawossdoda. tto gakkawossdoda
75|36|ingan-eun jasin-i guaebadji anhgo naebeolyeojil geos-ila saeng-gaghaneunga
75|37|geuneun bunchulhaneun jeong-aeg bang-ul-iji anh-assdeonga
75|38|geuleon hu geuneun eunghyeol-ieoss-eumyeo geu hu geubunkkeseoneun mandeusigo gyunhyeong-eul jab-eusyeossnola
75|39|geu hu geubunkkeseoneun geulobuteo ssang-eul dusini namjawa yeojala
75|40|geuleohan bunkkeseo jug-eun jadeul-eul sallisil su eobsdan mal-inga
76|1|ingan-eun sigan-ui heuleum sog-eseo eongeubjocha doeji anhdeon sigiga issji anh-assdeonga
76|2|sillo naneun ingan-eul honhabdoen bang-ullobuteo changjohayeossgo geuleul siheomhani geuleul deudgo boneun jalo dueossnola
76|3|sillo naneun geuege gil-eul galikyeo jueoss-euni (geuneun) gamsahaneun jageona bulsinhaneun jadeola
76|4|sillo naneun bulsinjadeul-ege saseulgwa meong-ewa hwayeom-eul junbihae dueossnola
76|5|sillo sin-ang-in-eun suljan-eul masineunde geugeos-e seokk-in geos-eun jangnoela
76|6|hananim-ui jongbogdeul-eun geugeos(jangnoe)i majdah-eun umul-eul masini geudeul-eun geugeos(umul)eul pungseonghi gilleonaedeola
76|7|geudeul-eun maengse-ui mal-eul junsuhamyeo, saagham-i mol-achil geunal-eul dulyeowohago
76|8|bul-uhan jawa goawa polo-ege jasin-i aechaghaneun eumsig-eul judeola
76|9|uliga geudaedeul-ege eumsig-eul jum-eun ojig hananim-ui eolgul-eul wiham-imyeo ulineun geudaedeullobuteo bosang-ina gamsado wonhaji anhnola
76|10|sillo ulineun eolgul-eul jjipulyeoya hal heomnanhan nal-e uliui junim-eul dulyeowohanola
76|11|geulihayeo hananimkkeseoneun geunal-ui saagham-eulobuteo geudeul-eul guhae jusyeoss-eumyeo geudeul-i pogeunhamgwa jeulgeoum-eul yeongjeobtolog haejusyeossnola
76|12|geuligo geubunkkeseoneun geudeul-ui innaee daehae bosanghasyeoss-euni cheonguggwa bidan-ila
76|13|geugos-eseo geudeul-eun chayang-i deuliwojin chimdae wie mom-eul gidaego, geugos-eseo geudeul-eun taeyang-eul boji anh-eumyeo doenchuwido eobsnola
76|14|geugos-ui geuneul-eun geudeul-ege deuliwojyeo iss-eumyeo geugos-ui gwasil-eun (ttagiga) maeu suwolhaejyeo issnola
76|15|eun-eulo doen geuleusgwa tumyeonghan keob-i geudeul juwileul doni
76|16|eun-eulo doen tumyeonghan keob-euloseo geudeul-eun geugeos(keob)eul jeogdanghan yang-eulo jojeolhanola
76|17|geuligo geudeul-eun geugos-eseo suljan-eulo masil geoliga jueojineunde geugeos-e seokk-in geos-eun saeng-gang-imyeo
76|18|geugos-eseo 'salsabil'ilaneun ileum-ui umul-eul masinola
